scripts.build: cd client && npm run build && cd ../server && npm run build
scripts.install-all: npm run install-server && npm run install-client
scripts.lint: cd server && npm run lint && cd ../client && npm run lint
scripts.lint:fix: cd server && npm run lint:fix && cd ../client && npm run lint:fix
scripts.test: cd server && npm test && cd client && npm test
scripts.test:watch: concurrently "cd server && npm run test:watch" "cd client && npm run test:watch"
scripts.type-check: cd server && npm run type-check && cd client && npm run type-check
